name: Bodily Enhancements
entries: At 6th level, your body is more accustomed to transforming. You gain resistance to Necrotic Damage, but this resistance is lost while a weapon is conjured. Furthermore, your weapons are stronger.

entries.name: Blade
entries: Your walking speed whilst the Blade is summoned is now increased by 15 feet. You gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed, and you can take the Dash action as a Bonus action

entries.name: Cannon
entries: If you damage a creature with a Cantrip, you have advantage on the next different cantrip attack you make against them. This bonus is lost after 1 minute.

entries.name: Shield
entries: You gain a +2 bonus to your Armor Class provided by your Shield, and you can add the Armor Class Bonus from this shield to Dexterity Saving throws.
